emails.subject: Question About Premium Subscription Billing
emails.body_text:
Dear Treslingo Team,

I hope you can assist me with a billing question I have regarding my premium subscription. I signed up for it a couple of months ago, and since then, I’ve been charged $9.99 each month. However, I wasn’t sure if my subscription was automatically renewed. I thought I’d seen an option to cancel it before the next billing cycle, but now I can’t find that information in the app!

I have found it super helpful having no ads and being able to download lessons for offline use while commuting to work. But, to be honest, I’m still on the fence about whether I want to continue the premium service because my free time is limited, and I don’t want to be charged if I'm not using it enough. I would appreciate it if you could let me know how to manage my billing options – maybe I can pause or cancel it instead?

Thank you for your help. Looking forward to your prompt response!

Sincerely,

John Thomas
john.thomas@email.com
